glosses: in any way, shape, or form

examples.text: Sonra da bu işe uzaktan yakından dâhil olan herkesi öldüreceğim.
examples.translation: Then I will kill everyone who is involved in this affair in any way, shape, or form.

etymology: From uzak (“far, distant”) + -tan (ablative suffix) + yakın (“close, near”) + -dan (ablative suffix), literally “from far, from near”.
